message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $10,500.
